entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning late this morning then changing to 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
